gatha wuye nimesayaki nawathath pera prema ranganayama arabana ladi.

abhyanthara prajathanthrawadaya pakshayak thula nathi thana, kisiyam pawulaka ho yamkisi prabhu kandayamaka wuwamanawa pamanak itu karana paksha lesa mewa kriyathmaka wena thak kal, prajathanthrawadi samajayak godanagimata, prajathanthrawadi deshapalanayak kriyathmaka kirimata mema pakshawalata haki nowanu atha.
ee prakashayata noyekuth aya noyekuth arthakathana denna patan aragena thibenawa.
meka athithayakma witharayi.
kawada wage da wiwaha wenna hithan inne?
flashar mukuth nathiwa swabhawika aalokaya ihala sita pahalata yomuwana aakarayata thamayi yodagena thiyenne.

pahugiya dawaswala aaranchi pathirila giya, sayif wiwaha wunaya kiyala.ee gana samaharu magen ahanawa monawada hithenne kiyala.aththatama pasugiya dawaswala witharak nemeyi, me dawaswalath siddha wunu dewal, siddha wena dewal mama hariyata danne naha.ee kohoma wunath, sayif gen aathwunata passe mama dan samanya, sarala jiwithayak gatha karanawa.
eewata welawa thiyenawa.
mama kohoma hari kadulu atharinma kiyanna thiyana dewal kiwa.
me athibahutharaya rate deshapalanagnyayan athulu thiranathmaka balawegayan wisin kalin kalata osawa thabanno wethi.
anekuth wadasatahan narambaimata apa adawiyata paminena deshiya saha wideshiya prekshakayi me nisa mahath apahasuthawayakata path wi atha.
onna sudu pata wan ekak thiyanawa.
samaga bedahada gannata waram labanne ee owun depala ekwa rahan rahitha paniwida yawime krama sanwardhanayata laba dun dayakathwaya wenuwenuyi.
ema sath karyayata ura dena hama denatama theruwan sarana pathiya.
me tikata uththara dunnoth mama eelanga prashnaya ahannam..
oya anunge blog wala sadachare gana ka gahana anola sadachare rakinna yanneth kunuharapa kiyala.
wedanawan tiken tika yali  dinen dina adu wu niya
esema naya dena aya ha naya labaganna aya athara da wenas kamaththan dakiya hakiyi.
ee ee mohotha wenas karamin, samabara karamin, husma ganimin ya haki madhyayak.

guru sewayen wishrama labu dhammawansa himiyo yali anuradhapura wihara bulankulamehi shri wardhanaramayata wadama kota raja rata dushkara gammana diyunu kirima udesa thama diwiya kapa karamin katayuthu karathi.
lankawe pahala wunu agraganya buddhimathaku wana gunadasa amarasekarayan wisin 2011 wasaredi pala kala lipiyak ada edatath wada ehi athi kalina bawa salaka api mese yali pala karannemu.
yanna thanak nathi inna thanak nathitharamata asarana wela wagema wata siya dahasak aya sitiyathmala sohonaka thani wela wage
neth ef.em sandahan karana paridi adala wadasatahanata […]
pihituwime siya sankalpaya kriyathmaka kirima brithanya thula kala nohakkak bawa penigiya heyin oowan mahatha 1822 di amerikawa bala pitathwa giyeya .
tikak igena gena thiyenawa.

oba kapi penena dakshayek nam hondin handa palandagena wadata aawoth oba dakina wita bhithiyen musapath wena thanathura, labha sathkarawalata kadara obema sahodara waidyawaru eka men pela gasi obata badha pamunuwannata nithi kapa wanu atha.
ee jathaka kathawe film eka balanawa wage kiyewwe.

pasugiya wasare merata paras dhana banku siyallama pahe rupiyal biliyana gananin labha upaya athi athara mema labhayata kala haki deyak nathi nisado maha bankuwe simawa ikmawa yamin banku parae gdhanaya wadi karannata awasara illa atha.
uwamanawak thibe nam akramikatha nawathwannata bari kamak na.
umbaalage thaththa ganu ekka yaddi mamath giya nam denna kanu wala kunu wela.
ayiya indahita bassige nawathanatada godawadinneya.
balu balmata sarala wunata kanekt fo sahenna hithanna oona, dam wage gem ekak.
anna priya ehenam dannawa athine ginna kohomada kiyala..balamu hombata anida kiyala
mama pandarama nagitala ethanata yanakota welawa dahayata withara athi.
thawamath 21wana wiye pasuwana narthanange ekama balapearoththuwa wi thibenne thama padinchi idama pilibandawa athi awula wisandagena ee sandaha balapathrayak laba ganimaya.

hariyata hansa sandeshaye kagalu game sasha්rikathwaya wage.nilla pirunu goyama, kiri kapena rabar katti, lama wasupatiyan handa...me siyalla punchi sawliyaslage kawi sitha pubuda lu nimithi wune nirayasayen.siyalla wenas wena dawasak enawa..
eeta passe bada gediya kala gediya wage aarala morala aawama pena tharuwalata man wisin waga kiyanu nolabe..!
ee gana liyawunu hondama kathawa.
kettuwa mattu kala haki kramaya wadi apahasu wuwak nowe.
kuriru lesa sinda damanu labu ee sabandiyawen hitha wu wana suwa wimata wasara gananak gath wi giyeya.
mul kristhiyani sabhawa kisima aakarayakin ada apa dakina palli krama men athishayinma widhimath lesa wyuhagatha wi nothibunu bawa pili noganimata kisima kenekuta sadharana padanamak natha.
janadhipathithuma, agamathithuma, aanduwa, mawa prathikshepa karanna oonima kenekuta puluwan.api me hadisiye minissunge dewal horakam karala, parawal komis gahala, nasthi karana aanduwak nemeyi.
